name: No safety
description: 2090 year. A global nuclear war has begun, the economy of all countries has fallen into decay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
